description: Compiled dataset of 2,359 time series containing 552,475 observations of 4,718 coastal and marine taxa across 2,246 sites, organized by six biotic groups (birds, fish, invertebrates, macroalgae, phytoplankton, zooplankton)
keywords: European coastal and marine biodiversity, time series, birds, fish, invertebrates, macroalgae, phytoplankton, zooplankton, taxonomic richness, Shannon diversity, abundance trends, temporal trends
name: WP5 D5.1: European Coastal and Marine Biotic Groups Time Series Dataset
